testsuite.name: dev.idachev.recipeservice.web.RecipeControllerApiTest

testcase.name: Given valid keyword, token and pagination, when searching recipes, then return search results
Given valid recipe request and token, when creating recipe with JSON, then return created status with recipe
Given valid recipe data, ID and token, when updating recipe, then return updated recipe
Given valid ingredients and token, when generating meal, then return generated recipe
Given valid token, when getting all recipes, then return paginated recipes
Given valid recipe request and token, when creating recipe with image, then return created status with recipe
Given valid token, when getting user's recipes, then return user recipes
Given valid ID and token, when getting recipe by ID, then return recipe
Given valid ID and token, when deleting recipe, then return no content status
